attributes.action: address the issue whereby European students get grants intended for Welsh students studying at Welsh universities which English students cannot get
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Welsh Assembly gives a grant to Welsh students who choose to study at a Welsh university equalling half the tuition fees for that university. Students from elsewhere in the UK are not entitled to this grant and pay the full tuition fees. However, European students are treated the same as Welsh students, and so they receive this grant, thereby creating a system which discriminates against some British students for studying in their own country. We petition the government to correct this issue by ensuring European students do not receive any such grant.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
